title: Skinwalker's Woman
description: Running away from heartache is easier than facing it. But when Chellie runs from a bad relationship with a cheating ex and lands smack-dab in the arms of a hot and sexy stranger who thinks she was born to be his mate, could things get any weirder? They sure can...especially when she discovers she's a closet nymphomaniac and he's a shape-shifting explosion of animal magnetism she simply can't resist. A Romantica(r) paranormal erotic romance from Ellora's Ca
author: Fran Lee
